sentences.sContent: All visitors to the exhibition must report to the main service desk.
sentences.sContent_eng: All visitors to the exhibition must report to the main service desk.
sentences.sCn: 到展览会参观的人都必须先到总服务台报到。

sentences.sContent: Our country will tie up with another country to host this exhibition.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our country will tie up with another country to host this exhibition.
sentences.sCn: 我国将和另外一个国家联合主办这次展览会。

sentences.sContent: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.sContent_eng: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.sCn: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。

synos.tran: 展览，显示；展览会；展览品

words.tran: 裸露症患者；倾向自我宣传的人；喜欢出风头的人
展出者；获得奖学金的学生
裸露癖；自我宣传癖；喜出风头癖

remMethod.val: ex(出)+hibit(拿住)+ion(名词后缀)→拿出来→展览(会)

trans.tranOther: a show of paintings, photographs, or other objects that people can go to see
